Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if StopRota then StopRota = false PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFF15E615reenabled!") else StopRota = true PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFFE61515stopped!") end end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 21892, 40733, 97532, 41451 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy" } local elite = { "Overlord Ror", "Ragepaw", "Liam", "Galleon", "Fire Giant", "Hogger", "Specimen 23" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil local eliteboss = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if immunity or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end
for i,v in ipairs(elite) do if UnitName("target") == v then eliteboss = 1 end end
IsBoss = nil function IsBoss() if UnitExists("target") and ( UnitLevel("target") == -1 or eliteboss ) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Heal Engine (Pet also) --
Ability.Lua:
-- Simplest Heal Eng -- if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") and UnitHasVehicleUI("target") == false and UnitDebuffID("target", 69065) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target", 70157) == nil then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 lowhpmemberspets = 0 local lowest = 100
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 7 end if memberhp < 85 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < lowest then PQR_CustomTarget = member lowest = memberhp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end end end
if lowhpmembers == 0 then for i = 1, members, 1 do local memberpet = group..tostring"pet"..tostring(i) local memberpethp = 100 * UnitHealth(memberpet) / UnitHealthMax(memberpet) if UnitInRange(memberpet) and UnitIsFriend("player", memberpet) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(memberpet) == nil then if memberpethp < 85 then lowhpmemberspets = lowhpmemberspets +1 end if memberpethp < lowest then PQR_CustomTarget = memberpet lowest = memberpethp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end end end end end
-- Need this to stop casting to avoid stun -- local name, _, _, _, caststart, castend = UnitCastingInfo("target")
if UnitCastingInfo("target") ~= nil and UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Flame Jets" and castend - ( GetTime() * 1000 ) < .5 then SpellStopCasting() return true end
if view == nil then view = true local eventframe = CreateFrame("FRAME") print("\124cFFE61515DO NOT TARGET A FRIENDLY PLAYER!") print("\124cFFE61515НЕ ВЫБИРАТЬ В КАЧЕСТВИ ЦЕЛИ СОЮЗНИКА!") eventframe:RegisterEvent("EXECUTE_CHAT_LINE") end

Ability.Name: -- All:Mouseover --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: B:Eclipse
-- Functions --
Ability.Lua:
if not FuncLoaded then FuncLoaded = true
GotClearCast = 0
-- Heal Trinket Checker -- UsableTrink = { 450139 -- Living Cauterizing Flames 2019 }
function IsUsableTrink() for i=1, #UsableTrink do if IsEquippedItem(UsableTrink[i], 13) then return true end end end
-- Glyph Check -- glyph = function(glyphID) local hasglyph = false; local i = 1; local glyph = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i); while glyph do local id = select(3, GetGlyphSocketInfo(i)); if id == glyphID then hasglyph = true; break; end i = i + 1; glyph = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i); end return hasglyph; end
-- Check target -- function CanAttack() if UnitExists("target") and UnitCanAttack("player", "target") == 1 then return true end end
function UnX() if UnitExists("target") then return true end end
-- Check if player move -- function pMove() if GetUnitSpeed("player") >= 3 then return true end end
-- Check if player stay -- function pStay() if GetUnitSpeed("player") == 0 then return true end end
function CalculateHP(t) local ActualWithIncoming = 100 * UnitHealth(t) / UnitHealthMax(t) if UnitExists(t) then return ActualWithIncoming else return 100 end end
function CanHeal(t) if UnitExists(t) and not UnitIsCharmed(t) --and UnitInRange(t) == 1 and IsSpellInRange("Healing Touch", t) == 1 and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) --and UnitCanCooperate("player", t) == 1 --and ZoneHealCheck(t) == true --and not UnitDebuffID(t, 30843) --Kara healing Debuff --and not UnitDebuffID(t, 55593) --and not UnitDebuffID(t, 33786) then --Clone then return true end end
function threat(t) if UnitExists(t) and UnitThreatSituation(t) ~= nil then return UnitThreatSituation(t) else return 0 end end
-- Stuff for shit -- function HealEngine() members, group = { { Unit = "player", HP = CalculateHP("player") } }, { low = 0 } group.type = GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 and "raid" or "party" group.number = group.type == "raid" and GetNumRaidMembers() or GetNumPartyMembers() for i=1,group.number do if UnitExists(group.type..i) and CanHeal(group.type..i) then local unit, hp = group.type..i, CalculateHP(group.type..i) table.insert( members,{ Unit = unit, HP = hp } ) if hp < 90 then group.low = group.low + 1 end end end if group.type == "raid" and #members > 1 then table.remove(members,1) end table.sort(members, function(x,y) return x.HP < y.HP end) end
function CheckDistance(unit1,unit2) local a1,b1 = GetPlayerMapPosition(unit1) local a2,b2 = GetPlayerMapPosition(unit2) local _, h, w = GetMapInfo() local x1 , y1 = a1 * 1000, b1 * 1000 local x2 , y2 = a2 * 1000, b2 * 1000
local distance = sqrt(min(x1 - x2, w - (x1 - x2))^2 + min(y1 - y2, h - (y1-y2))^2)
return distance end
function UnitsClose(t) local n = -1 for i=1,#members do if CheckDistance(t,members[i].Unit) < 4.648 and members[i].HP < 95 then n = n + 1 end end return n end
-- Rage Check -- ragecost = nil function ragecost(spellid) local rage = UnitPower("player") if rage >= select(4, GetSpellInfo(spellid)) then return true else return false end end
-- Druid Stuff --
function RecentClearCast() if GetTime() - GotClearCast < .5 then return true else return false end end
if RecentClearCast() == true then return true end
function testv() return "\124cFF15E615DarhangeR original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: Discord official chanel: https://discord.gg/zayx7p9" end PQR_WriteToChat(testv())
CantMangle = nil function CantMangle() local CantMangle = false for i = 1, #members do local memberrole = select(2, UnitClass(members[i].Unit)) if memberrole == "WARRIOR" then CantMangle = true end end return CantMangle end
function rip(sec) local hasrip, _, _, _, _, _, rtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 49800, "player") if UnitExists("target") and hasrip ~= nil and rtime - GetTime() >= sec then return true else return false end end
function savage(sec) local hassavage, _, _, _, _, _, stime = UnitBuffID("player", 52610) if hassavage ~= nil and stime - GetTime() >= sec then return true else return false end end
function Wait() if UnitExists("target") and UnitName("target") == "The Curator" then if UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Evocation" or UnitChannelInfo("target") == "Evocation" then return false end if CuratorDebuff ~= nil and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff > 12 and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff < 17 then return true else return false end end return false end
-- Energy Check -- function energycost(spellid) local berserk = select(11, UnitBuffID("player", 50334)) local energy = UnitPower("player") local fben = (berserk == 50334 and 17) or 35 --Ferocious Bite if spellid == 48577 then if energy >= fben then return true end end local men = (berserk == 50334 and 17) or 34 --Mangle if spellid == 48566 then if energy >= men then return true end end local raen = (berserk == 50334 and 17) or 35 --Rake if spellid == 48574 then if energy >= raen then return true end end local ren = (berserk == 50334 and 10) or 20 --Rip if spellid == 49800 then if energy >= ren then return true end end local sren = ( berserk == 50334 and 12 ) or 25 --Savage Roar if spellid == 52610 then if energy >= sren then return true end end --local sen = select(4, GetSpellInfo(48572)) --Shred local sen = (berserk == 50334 and 21) or 42 if spellid == 48572 then if energy >= sen then return true end end --local swen = select(4, GetSpellInfo(62078)) --Swipe local swen = (berserk == 50334 and 22) or 45 if spellid == 62078 then if energy >= swen then return true end end return false end
-- Combat Check -- function inCombat() if UnitAffectingCombat("player") ~= nil then return true end end
-- Get HP simple -- function getHp(unit) if UnitExists(unit) ~= nil then return 100 * UnitHealth(unit) / UnitHealthMax(unit) end end
-- Get Mana simple -- function getMana(unit) if UnitExists(unit) ~= nil then return 100 * UnitPower(unit) / UnitPowerMax(unit) end end
-- Spell Cooldown remaining check -- CooldownRemains = nil function CooldownRemains(spell) local start, duration, enable = GetSpellCooldown(spell) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Amount of Cooldown that remains -- function cdRemains(spellid) if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) > 0 then return select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) else return 0 end end
-- Item Cooldown remaining check -- ItemCooldownRemains = nil function ItemCooldownRemains(item) local start, duration, enable = GetItemCooldown(item) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Range Check Simple -- function rangeCheck(spellid,unit) if IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid),unit) == 1 then return true end end
-- Validator -- valid = nil function valid(t, spellid) if UnitExists(t) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) and UnitCanAttack("player", t) == 1 and UnitDebuffID("target", 33786) == nil and IsUsableSpell(GetSpellInfo(spellid)) == 1 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid), t) == 1 then return true else return false end end
-- CastSpell -- function _castSpell(spellid,tar) if UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil --and IsPlayerSpell(spellid) == true and cdRemains(spellid) == 0 then if tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == nil then return false elseif tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == true then CastSpellByID(spellid, tar) return true elseif tar == nil then CastSpellByID(spellid) return true else return false end end end
end HealEngine()
-- Druid Stuff -- if not FrameCreated then
NotBehindTarget = 0
local DarhangeR = CreateFrame("Frame") DarhangeR:SetScript("OnEvent", function(self,event,...) if event == "UI_ERROR_MESSAGE" then local msg = ... if msg:find("behind") ~= nil then NotBehindTarget = GetTime() PQR_WriteToChat("|cff00ffffNot behind the target for Shred! |r") end if msg:find("Target not in") ~= nil and Healing == true then CantHeal = GetTime() end end if event == "UNIT_SPELLCAST_SENT" then local unit, spell = ... if unit == "player" and spell == GetSpellInfo(61384) and CheckSpell == 61384 then SpellSuccess = true end end if event == "CHAT_MSG_WHISPER" then local msg, sender = ... for k = 1, #toons do --Follow toon if sender == toons[k] and string.find(msg, "follow") then RunMacroText("/follow "..sender) end end end if event == "COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED" then local _, subevent, _, source, _, _, dest, _, spellID, spellName, _, amount, stolen, absorbed, resist = ... if source == UnitName("player") then if subevent == "SPELL_CAST_SUCCESS" then if spellID == CheckSpell then SpellSuccess = true end if spellID == 2782 then PQR_WriteToChat("Just dispelled "..dest) end end --Check for Clearcasting if subevent == "SPELL_AURA_APPLIED" or subevent == "SPELL_AURA_REFRESH" then if spellID == 16870 then GotClearCast = GetTime() end end end if source == "The Curator" then if subevent == "UNIT_DIED" then CuratorDebuff = nil end if subevent == "SPELL_AURA_APPLIED" then if spellID == 21892 then PQR_WriteToChat("The Curator just applied Arcane Protection") CuratorDebuff = GetTime() end end end end --Spell casting events if event == "UNIT_SPELLCAST_START" then local unit, spell = ... if unit == "player" then if spell == GetSpellInfo(32375) and CheckSpell == 32375 then SpellSuccess = true end if spell == GetSpellInfo(33786) and CheckSpell == 33786 then SpellSuccess = true end if spell == GetSpellInfo(61384) and CheckSpell == 61384 then SpellSuccess = true end end end if event == "ZONE_CHANGED_NEW_AREA" then zoned = GetTime() CheckSpell = 0 end if event == "PLAYER_DEAD" then CheckSpell = 0 end end)
DarhangeR:RegisterEvent("UI_ERROR_MESSAGE")
FrameCreated = true
function Wait() if UnitExists("target") and UnitName("target") == "The Curator" then if UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Evocation" or UnitChannelInfo("target") == "Evocation" then return false end if CuratorDebuff ~= nil and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff > 12 and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff < 17 then return true else return false end end return false end
function RecentClearCast() if GetTime() - GotClearCast < .5 then return true else return false end end
function NotBehindCheck() if GetTime() - NotBehindTarget < 4 or UnitName("target") == "The Curator" then return true else return false end end
end

Ability.Name: B:Moonkin Form
Ability.Lua: if not moonkin and not dash then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Moonfire
Ability.Lua:
local mfire, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitDebuffID("target", 48463, "player")
if ( mfire == nil or ( mfire and timer - GetTime() < 2 ) or pMove() ) and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48463, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Insect Swarm
Ability.Lua:
local iswarm, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitDebuffID("target", 48468, "player")
if ( iswarm == nil or ( iswarm and timer - GetTime() < 2.5 ) ) and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48468, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Wrath
Ability.Lua: if eclipse == "solar" and CanAttack() and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(48461)) == 0 or pStay() ) and rangeCheck(48461, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Starfire
Ability.Lua: if eclipse == "lunar" and CanAttack() and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(48465)) == 0 or pStay() ) and rangeCheck(48465, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Tree of Life
R:Lifebloom
Ability.Lua:
lb,_,_,count,_,_,expire = UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48451)
if count ~= 3 or expire - GetTime() < 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Remove Curse
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 30108, 34914, 74562, 74792 } local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 0, members, 1 do if i==0 then mem = "player" else mem = group..tostring(i) end if UnitInRange(mem) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(mem) == nil then local candispel = 1 for k,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(mem,v) then candispel = nil end end local j = 1 local debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,dur = UnitDebuff(mem, j) while debuff do if (bufftype == "Curse") and dur > 1 and candispel then CastSpellByID(2782,mem) return true end j = j + 1; debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(mem, j) end end end

Ability.Name: R:Regrowth
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 75 and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(48443)) == 0 or pStay() ) then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Nourish
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 75 and UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48451) and UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48443) and UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48441) and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(50464)) == 0 or pStay() ) then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Swiftmend
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 50 and not CooldownRemains(18562) and UnitDebuffID("player", 69762) == nil and (UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48441) or UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48443)) then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Abolish Poison
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 30108, 34914, 74562, 74792 } local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 0, members, 1 do if i==0 then mem = "player" else mem = group..tostring(i) end if UnitInRange(mem) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(mem) == nil then local candispel = 1 for k,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(mem,v) then candispel = nil end end local j = 1 local debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,dur = UnitDebuff(mem, j) while debuff do if (bufftype == "Poison") and dur > 1 and candispel and UnitBuffID(mem, 2893) == nil then CastSpellByID(2893,mem) return true end j = j + 1; debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(mem, j) end end end

Ability.Name: R:Rejuvenation
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48441, "player") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Rejuvenation (All)
Ability.Lua:
local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48441, "player") == nil then CastSpellByID(48441, "player") end
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) if UnitBuffID(member, 48441, "player") == nil and UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil and UnitHasVehicleUI(member) == false and UnitDebuffID(member, 69065) == nil and UnitDebuffID(member, 70157) == nil then CastSpellByID(48441, member) end end

Ability.Name: R:Wild Growth
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP <= 100 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Berserk
Ability.Lua:
local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if IsBoss() and rangeCheck(48574, "target") and CooldownRemains(50334) ~= nil and not berserk and not tigers and savage(10) and rip(10) and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Cat Form
Ability.Lua: if not catform then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Rake
Ability.Lua:
local rake, _, _, _, _, _, rtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 48574, "player") local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if rake == nil and energycost(48574) and CanAttack() and AOE() == false and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and (( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time >= 9 ) or calc_time == nil ) and rangeCheck(48574, "target") then --CastSpellByID(48574) return true end

Ability.Name: F:Shred
Ability.Lua: if cp < 5 and energycost(48572) and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and rake and CanAttack() then if NotBehindCheck() == false then CastSpellByID(48572) return true elseif NotBehindCheck() == true then CastSpellByID(48566) return true end end

Ability.Name: F:Savage Roar()
Ability.Lua:
local savage, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitBuffID("player", 52610) local rip, _, _, _, _, _, rtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 49800, "player") local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, mtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if energycost(52610) and cp >= 3 and ( (calc_time ~= nil and calc_time >= 9) or calc_time == nil ) and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and ( savage == nil or ( savage and time - GetTime() <= 8 ) ) and ( savage == nil or ( savage and rip == nil ) or ( savage and rip and rtime - time >= -3 ) ) and CanAttack() then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Tiger's Fury
Ability.Lua:
local berserk = select(11, UnitBuffID("player", 50334))
if ( berserk ~= 50334 or berserk == nil ) and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48574, "target") and CooldownRemains(50213) == false and energy <= 30 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Ferocious Bite
Ability.Lua:
local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if energycost(48577) and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48574, "target") and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and ( ( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time <= 6 and cp >= 5 ) or ( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time <= 1 and cp >= 4 ) or ( cp >= 5 and rip(8) and savage(11) ) ) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Savage Roar
Ability.Lua:
local savage, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitBuffID("player", 52610) local rip, _, _, _, _, _, rtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 49800, "player") local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, mtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if energycost(52610) and cp >= 1 and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and ( savage == nil or ( savage and time - GetTime() <= 1 ) ) and CanAttack() then --CastSpellByID(52610) return true end

Ability.Name: F:Rip
Ability.Lua:
local rip, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitDebuffID("target", 49800, "player") local rip = UnitDebuffID("target", 49800, "player") local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if cp >= 5 and ( ( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time >= 6 ) or calc_time == nil ) and AOE() == false and Wait() == false and CanAttack() and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and rangeCheck(48574, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Mangle (Cat)
Ability.Lua:
local mangle, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566)
if CantMangle() == false and CanAttack() and energycost(48566) and AOE() == false and ( mangle == nil or time - GetTime() < 1 ) and rangeCheck(48574, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Tranquility
Ability.Lua: if lowhpmembers >= 8 and not CooldownRemains(48447) and PQR_IsCastingSpell(48447) == false and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(48447)) == 0 or pStay() ) then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Force of Nature
Ability.Lua:
if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then CastSpellByID(33831) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end
if not UnitIsUnit("target","pettarget") then PetAttack() end

Ability.Name: B:Faerie Fire
Ability.Lua: if IsBoss() and CanAttack() and not FaFire and not fFaFire and rangeCheck(770, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Barkskin
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 40 and not CooldownRemains(22812) then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Nature's Grasp
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 65 and rangeCheck(48574, "target") and not CooldownRemains(53312) then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Typhoon
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Hurricane
Ability.Lua: if HN == true and CanAttack() and pStay() and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then CastSpellByID(48467) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: F:Faerie Fire
Ability.Lua: if not fFaFire and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(16857, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Swipe (Cat)
Ability.Lua: if AOE() == true and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48574, "target") and ( energycost(62078) ) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Rejuvenation (Cat)
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Bear Form
Ability.Lua: if not bearform and not dash then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Enrage
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") <= 75 and IsBoss() and UnX() and not CooldownRemains(5229) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Mangle (Bear)
Ability.Lua: if ragecost(48564) and CanAttack() and not CooldownRemains(48564) and rangeCheck(48564, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Maul
Ability.Lua: if ragecost(48480) and AOE() == false and rangeCheck(48568, "target") and CanAttack() and not CooldownRemains(48480) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Survival Instincts
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 40 and UnX() and not CooldownRemains(61336) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Frenzied Regeneration
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 40 and not CooldownRemains(22842) and UnX() then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Swipe (Bear)
Ability.Lua: if AOE() == true and ragecost(48562) and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48564, "target") then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Berserk (Bear)
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 50 and UnX() and not CooldownRemains(50334) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Bash
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Lacerate
Ability.Lua: if not lacerate or (lacerate and ( select(4, UnitDebuffID("target", 48568, "player")) < 5 or select(7, UnitDebuffID("target", 48568, "player")) - GetTime() < 3 )) and CanAttack() and AOE() == false then if rage > 30 and rangeCheck(48564, "target") then CastSpellByID(48480) end CastSpellByID(48568) return true end

Ability.Name: R:Gift of the Wild
Ability.Lua: if not GotW and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and (GetSpellInfo(48470) or GetItemCount(44605) >= 1) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") and not IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Thorns
Ability.Lua: if not thorns and inCombat() == nil and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") and not IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: -- DarhangeR --
Ability.Lua: -- I'm the original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: -- Discord official chanel: https://discord.gg/zayx7p9 -- VK: https://vk.com/darhanger -- FB: https://fb.com/darhanger -- Instagram: https://instagram.com/darhanger -- E-mail: civayan@gmail.com -- Dev Discord name: DarhangeR#6786

Ability.Name: R:Healing Touch
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 65 and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(48378)) == 0 or pStay() ) then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Stats Buffs / Flask --
Ability.Lua:
-- BG Check -- function BG() if GetZoneText() == "Warsong Gulch" or GetZoneText() == "Warsong Flag Room" or GetZoneText() == "Silverwing Hold" or GetZoneText() == "Isle of Conquest" or GetZoneText() == "Arathi Basin" or GetZoneText() == "Alterac Valley" or GetZoneText() == "Eye of the Storm" or GetZoneText() == "Strand of the Ancients" then return true else return false end end
-- BG Subzone Check -- function BGs() if GetSubZoneText() == "Warsong Flag Room" or GetSubZoneText() == "Silverwing Hold" then return true else return false end end
-- Arena Check -- function Arena () if GetZoneText() == "Ring of Valor" or GetZoneText() == "Ruins of Lordaeron" or GetZoneText() == "Ring of Trials" or GetZoneText() == "Circle of Blood" or GetZoneText() == "Dalaran Arena" or GetZoneText() == "Nagrand Arena" or GetZoneText() == "Blade's Edge Arena" then return true else return false end end
if NoKings == nil then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 26 then NoKings = true --else --NoKings = false end end end end
if not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") then
-- Voter Buff -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 35912) and not BG() and not BGs() and not Arena() and NoKings == true then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 26 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Donor Buff -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 35874) and not BG() and not BGs() and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 27 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Kings Buff / Drums -- if GetZoneText() ~= "Scarlet Monastery" and not UnitBuffID("player", 43223) and not UnitBuffID("player", 35912) and not UnitBuffID("player", 25898) and not Arena() or BG() or BGs() and NoKings == nil then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 49633 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end end
DPS = nil function DPS() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "DEATHKNIGHT" or playerClass == "HUNTER" or playerClass == "WARRIOR" or playerClass == "PALADIN" or playerClass == "ROGUE" then return true end end
SpellDPS = nil function SpellDPS() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "WARLOCK" or playerClass == "SHAMAN" or playerClass == "MAGE" or playerClass == "DRUID" or playerClass == "PRIEST" then return true end end
-- Elixir of Empowerment / 30 Spell Pen -- if SpellDPS() and not UnitBuffID("player", 28514) and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 22848 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Lesser Flask of Resistance / 50 To All Resistance -- if DPS() and not UnitBuffID("player", 62380) and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 44939 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end

Ability.Name: F:NO BLEAD
Ability.Lua:
local savage,_,_,_,_,_, savagetime = UnitBuffID("player", 52610)
if (UnitName("target") == "Sunblade Protector") and rangeCheck(48574, "target") then --Savage Roar if (savage == nil or ( savage and savagetime - GetTime() < 5 )) and cp > 1 and energycost(52610) then CastSpellByID(52610) return true end --Shred if cp < 5 and energycost(48572) then if NotBehindCheck() == false then CastSpellByID(48572) return true elseif NotBehindCheck() == true then CastSpellByID(48566) return true end end --Ferocious Bite if cp > 4 and savageage(0) and energycost(48577) then CastSpellByID(48577) return true end end
if UnitName("target") == "Sunblade Protector" then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Feral Function --
Ability.Lua:
if not FuncLoaded then FuncLoaded = true GotClearCast = 0
-- Tank Trinket Checker -- UsableTrink = { 450138 -- Everburning Shell 2019 }
function IsUsableTrink() for i=1, #UsableTrink do if IsEquippedItem(UsableTrink[i], 13) then return true end end end
-- Glyph Check -- glyph = function(glyphID) local hasglyph = false; local i = 1; local glyph = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i); while glyph do local id = select(3, GetGlyphSocketInfo(i)); if id == glyphID then hasglyph = true; break; end i = i + 1; glyph = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i); end return hasglyph; end
-- Check target -- function CanAttack() if UnitExists("target") and UnitCanAttack("player", "target") == 1 then return true end end
function UnX() if UnitExists("target") then return true end end
-- Check if player move -- function pMove() if GetUnitSpeed("player") >= 3 then return true end end
-- Check if player stay -- function pStay() if GetUnitSpeed("player") == 0 then return true end end
function CalculateHP(t) local ActualWithIncoming = 100 * UnitHealth(t) / UnitHealthMax(t) if UnitExists(t) then return ActualWithIncoming else return 100 end end
function CanHeal(t) if UnitExists(t) and not UnitIsCharmed(t) --and UnitInRange(t) == 1 and IsSpellInRange("Healing Touch", t) == 1 and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) --and UnitCanCooperate("player", t) == 1 --and ZoneHealCheck(t) == true --and not UnitDebuffID(t, 30843) --Kara healing Debuff --and not UnitDebuffID(t, 55593) --and not UnitDebuffID(t, 33786) then --Clone then return true end end
function threat(t) if UnitExists(t) and UnitThreatSituation(t) ~= nil then return UnitThreatSituation(t) else return 0 end end
-- Stuff for shit -- function HealEngine() members, group = { { Unit = "player", HP = CalculateHP("player") } }, { low = 0 } group.type = GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 and "raid" or "party" group.number = group.type == "raid" and GetNumRaidMembers() or GetNumPartyMembers() for i=1,group.number do if UnitExists(group.type..i) and CanHeal(group.type..i) then local unit, hp = group.type..i, CalculateHP(group.type..i) table.insert( members,{ Unit = unit, HP = hp } ) if hp < 90 then group.low = group.low + 1 end end end if group.type == "raid" and #members > 1 then table.remove(members,1) end table.sort(members, function(x,y) return x.HP < y.HP end) end
function CheckDistance(unit1,unit2) local a1,b1 = GetPlayerMapPosition(unit1) local a2,b2 = GetPlayerMapPosition(unit2) local _, h, w = GetMapInfo() local x1 , y1 = a1 * 1000, b1 * 1000 local x2 , y2 = a2 * 1000, b2 * 1000
local distance = sqrt(min(x1 - x2, w - (x1 - x2))^2 + min(y1 - y2, h - (y1-y2))^2)
return distance end
function UnitsClose(t) local n = -1 for i=1,#members do if CheckDistance(t,members[i].Unit) < 4.648 and members[i].HP < 95 then n = n + 1 end end return n end
-- Rage Check -- ragecost = nil function ragecost(spellid) local rage = UnitPower("player") if rage >= select(4, GetSpellInfo(spellid)) then return true else return false end end
-- Druid Stuff --
function RecentClearCast() if GetTime() - GotClearCast < .5 then return true else return false end end
if RecentClearCast() == true then return true end
CantMangle = nil function CantMangle() local CantMangle = false for i = 1, #members do local memberrole = select(2, UnitClass(members[i].Unit)) if memberrole == "WARRIOR" then CantMangle = true end end return CantMangle end
function rip(sec) local hasrip, _, _, _, _, _, rtime = UnitDebuffID("target", 49800, "player") if UnitExists("target") and hasrip ~= nil and rtime - GetTime() >= sec then return true else return false end end
function savage(sec) local hassavage, _, _, _, _, _, stime = UnitBuffID("player", 52610) if hassavage ~= nil and stime - GetTime() >= sec then return true else return false end end
function Wait() if UnitExists("target") and UnitName("target") == "The Curator" then if UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Evocation" or UnitChannelInfo("target") == "Evocation" then return false end if CuratorDebuff ~= nil and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff > 12 and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff < 17 then return true else return false end end return false end
-- Energy Check -- function energycost(spellid) local berserk = select(11, UnitBuffID("player", 50334)) local energy = UnitPower("player") local fben = (berserk == 50334 and 17) or 35 --Ferocious Bite if spellid == 48577 then if energy >= fben then return true end end local men = (berserk == 50334 and 17) or 34 --Mangle if spellid == 48566 then if energy >= men then return true end end local raen = (berserk == 50334 and 17) or 35 --Rake if spellid == 48574 then if energy >= raen then return true end end local ren = (berserk == 50334 and 10) or 20 --Rip if spellid == 49800 then if energy >= ren then return true end end local sren = ( berserk == 50334 and 12 ) or 25 --Savage Roar if spellid == 52610 then if energy >= sren then return true end end --local sen = select(4, GetSpellInfo(48572)) --Shred local sen = (berserk == 50334 and 21) or 42 if spellid == 48572 then if energy >= sen then return true end end --local swen = select(4, GetSpellInfo(62078)) --Swipe local swen = (berserk == 50334 and 22) or 45 if spellid == 62078 then if energy >= swen then return true end end return false end
-- Combat Check -- function inCombat() if UnitAffectingCombat("player") ~= nil then return true end end
-- Get HP simple -- function getHp(unit) if UnitExists(unit) ~= nil then return 100 * UnitHealth(unit) / UnitHealthMax(unit) end end
function testv() return "\124cFF15E615DarhangeR original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: Discord official chanel: https://discord.gg/zayx7p9" end PQR_WriteToChat(testv())
-- Spell Cooldown remaining check -- CooldownRemains = nil function CooldownRemains(spell) local start, duration, enable = GetSpellCooldown(spell) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Amount of Cooldown that remains -- function cdRemains(spellid) if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) > 0 then return select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) else return 0 end end
-- Item Cooldown remaining check -- ItemCooldownRemains = nil function ItemCooldownRemains(item) local start, duration, enable = GetItemCooldown(item) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Range Check Simple -- function rangeCheck(spellid,unit) if IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid),unit) == 1 then return true end end
-- Validator -- valid = nil function valid(t, spellid) if UnitExists(t) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) and UnitCanAttack("player", t) == 1 and UnitDebuffID("target", 33786) == nil and IsUsableSpell(GetSpellInfo(spellid)) == 1 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid), t) == 1 then return true else return false end end
-- CastSpell -- function _castSpell(spellid,tar) if UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil --and IsPlayerSpell(spellid) == true and cdRemains(spellid) == 0 then if tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == nil then return false elseif tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == true then CastSpellByID(spellid, tar) return true elseif tar == nil then CastSpellByID(spellid) return true else return false end end end
end HealEngine()
-- Druid Stuff -- if not FrameCreated then
NotBehindTarget = 0
local DarhangeR = CreateFrame("Frame") DarhangeR:SetScript("OnEvent", function(self,event,...) if event == "UI_ERROR_MESSAGE" then local msg = ... if msg:find("behind") ~= nil then NotBehindTarget = GetTime() PQR_WriteToChat("|cff00ffffNot behind the target for Shred! |r") end if msg:find("Target not in") ~= nil and Healing == true then CantHeal = GetTime() end end if event == "UNIT_SPELLCAST_SENT" then local unit, spell = ... if unit == "player" and spell == GetSpellInfo(61384) and CheckSpell == 61384 then SpellSuccess = true end end if event == "CHAT_MSG_WHISPER" then local msg, sender = ... for k = 1, #toons do --Follow toon if sender == toons[k] and string.find(msg, "follow") then RunMacroText("/follow "..sender) end end end if event == "COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED" then local _, subevent, _, source, _, _, dest, _, spellID, spellName, _, amount, stolen, absorbed, resist = ... if source == UnitName("player") then if subevent == "SPELL_CAST_SUCCESS" then if spellID == CheckSpell then SpellSuccess = true end if spellID == 2782 then PQR_WriteToChat("Just dispelled "..dest) end end --Check for Clearcasting if subevent == "SPELL_AURA_APPLIED" or subevent == "SPELL_AURA_REFRESH" then if spellID == 16870 then GotClearCast = GetTime() end end end if source == "The Curator" then if subevent == "UNIT_DIED" then CuratorDebuff = nil end if subevent == "SPELL_AURA_APPLIED" then if spellID == 21892 then PQR_WriteToChat("The Curator just applied Arcane Protection") CuratorDebuff = GetTime() end end end end --Spell casting events if event == "UNIT_SPELLCAST_START" then local unit, spell = ... if unit == "player" then if spell == GetSpellInfo(32375) and CheckSpell == 32375 then SpellSuccess = true end if spell == GetSpellInfo(33786) and CheckSpell == 33786 then SpellSuccess = true end if spell == GetSpellInfo(61384) and CheckSpell == 61384 then SpellSuccess = true end end end if event == "ZONE_CHANGED_NEW_AREA" then zoned = GetTime() CheckSpell = 0 end if event == "PLAYER_DEAD" then CheckSpell = 0 end end)
DarhangeR:RegisterEvent("UI_ERROR_MESSAGE")
FrameCreated = true
function Wait() if UnitExists("target") and UnitName("target") == "The Curator" then if UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Evocation" or UnitChannelInfo("target") == "Evocation" then return false end if CuratorDebuff ~= nil and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff > 12 and GetTime() - CuratorDebuff < 17 then return true else return false end end return false end
function RecentClearCast() if GetTime() - GotClearCast < .5 then return true else return false end end
function NotBehindCheck() if GetTime() - NotBehindTarget < 4 or UnitName("target") == "The Curator" then return true else return false end end
end

Ability.Name: F:-- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if StopRota then StopRota = false PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFF15E615reenabled!") else StopRota = true PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFFE61515stopped!") end end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if not AOE then function AOE() if AoE == true then return true else return false end end end
if IsRightAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - modtime > 0.3 then modtime = GetTime() if AoE then AoE = false PQR_WriteToChat("AoE: \124cFFE61515Disabled") else AoE = true PQR_WriteToChat("AoE: \124cFF15E615Enabled") end end

Ability.Name: F:Shred(PRO)
Ability.Lua:
local savage,_,_,_,_,_, savagetime = UnitBuffID("player", 52610) local rake, _, _, _, _, _, raketime = UnitDebuffID("target", 48574, "player")
if energycost(48572) and ( mangle or CantMangle() == true ) and CanAttack() and rangeCheck(48574, "target") and ( ( cp <= 4 or rip(0.8) ) and rake and raketime - GetTime() >= 0.4 and ( energy >= 80 or berserk == 50334 or ( CooldownRemains(50213) == false or CooldownRemains(50213) <= 3 ) ) or ( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time <= 9 ) or ( cp <= 0 and ( savage == nil or ( savage and savagetime - GetTime() <= 2 ) ) ) ) then if NotBehindCheck() == false then CastSpellByID(48572) return true elseif NotBehindCheck() == true then CastSpellByID(48566) return true end end

Ability.Name: R:Regrowth (All)
Ability.Lua:
local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48443, "player") == nil then CastSpellByID(48443, "player") end
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) if UnitBuffID(member, 48443, "player") == nil and UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil and UnitHasVehicleUI(member) == false and UnitDebuffID(member, 69065) == nil and UnitDebuffID(member, 70157) == nil and ( select(7, GetSpellInfo(48443)) == 0 or pStay() ) then CastSpellByID(48443, member) end end

Ability.Name: -- All:Racial --
Ability.Lua:
if racialCheck == nil then racialCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 6215) --Fear end if racialCheck == nil then racialCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 8122) --Psychic scream end if racialCheck == nil then racialCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 5484) --Howl of Terror end if racialCheck == nil then racialCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 2637) --Hibernate end if racialCheck == nil then racialCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 5246) --Intimidating Shout end if racialCheck == nil then racialCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 6358) --Seduction end
-- Undead -- if racialCheck ~= nil then if (expire - GetTime()) >= 4 then if UnitRace("player") == "Undead" and IsSpellKnown(7744) and not CooldownRemains(7744) and CanAttack() then CastSpellByID(7744) return true end end end
-- Worgen -- if racialCheck ~= nil then if (expire - GetTime()) >= 4 then if UnitRace("player") == "Worgen" and IsSpellKnown(7744) and not CooldownRemains(7744) and CanAttack() then CastSpellByID(7744) return true end end end
if IsBoss() and CanAttack() then --Troll Berserking-- if UnitRace("player") == "Troll" and IsSpellKnown(26297) and not CooldownRemains(26297) then CastSpellByID(26297) return true end --Orc Blood Fury-- if UnitRace("player") == "Orc" and IsSpellKnown(33697) and not CooldownRemains(33697) then CastSpellByID(33697) return true end --Orc Blood Fury 2-- if UnitRace("player") == "Orc" and IsSpellKnown(20572) and not CooldownRemains(20572) then CastSpellByID(20572) return true end end
if CanAttack() then --Dwarf Stoneform-- if getHp("player") <= 35 and UnitRace("player") == "Dwarf" and IsSpellKnown(20594) and not CooldownRemains(20594) then CastSpellByID(20594) return true end --Draenei-- if getHp("player") <= 30 and UnitRace("player") == "Draenei" and IsSpellKnown(28880) and not CooldownRemains(28880) then CastSpellByID(28880) return true end --Naga-- if getHp("player") <= 30 and UnitRace("player") == "Naga" and IsSpellKnown(59542) and not CooldownRemains(59542) then CastSpellByID(59542) return true end end

Ability.Name: B:-- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if StopRota then StopRota = false PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFF15E615reenabled!") else StopRota = true PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFFE61515stopped!") end end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if IsRightAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - modtime > 0.3 then modtime = GetTime() if HN then HN = false PQR_WriteToChat("Hurricane \124cFFE61515Disabled") else HN = true PQR_WriteToChat("Hurricane \124cFF15E615Enabled") end end

Ability.Name: All:Auto Buff(Raid/Party)
Ability.Lua:
local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
-- Change true/false for auto buff raid AutoRaidBuff = true
if AutoRaidBuff then for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i)
-- Gift of the Wild if not UnitBuffID(member, 48470) and (GetSpellInfo(48470) or GetItemCount(44605) >= 1) and UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil and UnitHasVehicleUI(member) == false and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil then CastSpellByID(48470, member) end end end

Ability.Name: F:Regrowth(Cat)
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 55 and not bearform and pswitness and not regrowth then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Heal Engine --
Ability.Lua:
-- Simplest Heal Eng -- if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") and UnitHasVehicleUI("target") == false and UnitDebuffID("target", 69065) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target", 70157) == nil then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 local lowest = 100
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 7 end if memberhp < 85 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < lowest then PQR_CustomTarget = member lowest = memberhp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end end end
end
-- Need this to stop casting to avoid stun -- local name, _, _, _, caststart, castend = UnitCastingInfo("target")
if UnitCastingInfo("target") ~= nil and UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Flame Jets" and castend - ( GetTime() * 1000 ) < .5 then SpellStopCasting() return true end
if view == nil then view = true local eventframe = CreateFrame("FRAME") print("\124cFFE61515DO NOT TARGET A FRIENDLY PLAYER!") print("\124cFFE61515НЕ ВЫБИРАТЬ В КАЧЕСТВИ ЦЕЛИ СОЮЗНИКА!") eventframe:RegisterEvent("EXECUTE_CHAT_LINE") end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket(Tank)
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() and getHp("player") <= 15 and UnitExists("target") then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() and getHp("player") <= 15 and UnitExists("target") then UseInventoryItem(14) return true end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket(Heal)
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP <= 15 and cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() then UseInventoryItem(13, PQR_CustomTarget) return true end
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP <= 15 and cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() then UseInventoryItem(14, PQR_CustomTarget) return true end

Ability.Name: -- Autotarget script --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and not UnitExists("target") and not SpellIsTargeting() then RunMacroText("/targetenemy") return true end

Ability.Name: -- Druid Stuff --
Ability.Lua: -- Druid Stuff -- -- Dots / Debuffs -- FaFire = UnitDebuffID("target",770) fFaFire = UnitDebuffID("target",16857) iswarm = UnitDebuffID("target", 48468, "player") mfire = UnitDebuffID("target", 48463, "player") mangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 48566) rake = UnitDebuffID("target", 48574, "player") lacerate = UnitDebuffID("target", 48568, "player") -- Procs -- clearcast = UnitBuffID("player", 16870) pswitness = UnitBuffID("player", 69369) -- Forms -- moonkin = UnitBuffID("player", 24858) bearform = UnitBuffID("player", 9634) catform = UnitBuffID("player", 768) -- Buffs -- GotW = UnitBuffID("player", 48470) thorns = UnitBuffID("player",53307) dash = UnitBuffID("player", 33357, "player") berserk = select(11, UnitBuffID("player", 50334)) berserk = UnitBuffID("player", 50334) tigers = UnitBuffID("player", 50213) -- Healing -- regrowth = UnitBuffID("player", 48443) -- Other -- energy = UnitPower("player") rage = UnitPower("player") cp = GetComboPoints("player")

Ability.Name: -- All:Healthstone --
Ability.Lua:
local stones = { 36892, 36893, 36894 }
for i = 1, #stones do if getHp("player") <= 25 and GetItemCount(stones[i]) >= 1 and not ItemCooldownRemains(stones[i]) then UseItemByName(stones[i]) end end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells(H) --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 21892, 40733, 97532, 41451 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy" } local elite = { "Overlord Ror", "Ragepaw", "Liam", "Galleon", "Fire Giant", "Hogger", "Specimen 23" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil local eliteboss = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end
for i,v in ipairs(elite) do if UnitName("target") == v then eliteboss = 1 end end
IsBoss = nil function IsBoss() if UnitExists("target") and ( UnitLevel("target") == -1 or eliteboss ) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end end
